sentences.english: Kate: I know very little about her. What other films has she been in?
sentences.chinese: 我对张静初了解得很少。她还演过什么别的电影吗？

sentences.english: Zhang is one of the few actresses who are merely active in films;
sentences.chinese: 张静初是为数未几的几个，专注于影坛发展演员之一。
